reviewText: I've bought this under at least 4 different titles. Guess I'm just a sucker for the music of the 40's and 50's. I ain't really mad at cha. I just give them away to friencs.

If you are of a certain age or just enjoy the music of that period, this is a treasured experience you will want to have over and over.
Seeing as well as hearing these historic musical giants perform in a sort of black Ed Sullivan format is a pure pleasure.
The sound is antiquated, but enjoyable.
The performances are enthusiastic and charismatic.
Just a lot of fun to listen to!
I plan on looking up other recordings in this series!!
